title: Looking for Top Laner - D5+
body: Hello we are looking for a permanent diamond top laner that actually mains top lane. Needs to know general top lane champions such as Gnar, Kennen, Lissandra, Sion and so on. Add Hoodlum in game.

replies.body: Im more into heca, fiora, renek, liss and sion atm. strong and solid top. tend to split push and farm 200+ in 20
